text: wdhlk hin alhmna ammak: 'ana dey abnak musaa baed wiladatih fi altabwt, thuma atrhyh fi alnyl, fasawf ylqyh alnayl ealaa alsahl, fyakhdhh fireawn eaduiy wedwh. wa'alqayt ealayk mahabatan miniy fsrt bdhlk mhbwbana bayn alebad, wlitrba ealaa eayni wafi hfzy. wafi alayat 'iithbat sifat aleayn lilah - subhanah wteala - kama ylyq bjlalh wkmalh
